metadataAttributes.Title: Robotics Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Learn the Building Blocks for a Career in Robotics. Gain experience programming robots to perform in situations and for use in crisis management
metadataAttributes.Skills: Motion Planning, Particle Filter, Matlab, Robotics, Quadcoper, Automated Planning And Scheduling, A* Search Algorithm, Serial Line Internet Protocol (SLIP), Robot, Computer Vision, Estimation, Random Sample Consensus (Ransac),
metadataAttributes.Instructors: Vijay Kumar ,CJ Taylor ,Daniel E. Koditschek ,Kostas Daniilidis ,Jianbo Shi ,Daniel Lee ,Sid Deliwala ,
